name: Baba Altama - 1st Stitch
description:
Baba Altama - 1st Stitch is an RPG platformer about an old lady who can make magical crochets. She must travel the world destroying part of her work that became mad (the evil crochets) and fixing their destruction.

This is a prototype version. If you enjoyed the game, let me know! Maybe I consider working on a full version.

PS: There's some bugs since this was created with a much older Construct 2 version and re-exported. I will fix it as soon as I can.

For more games please visit: https://www.indigoarts.net
